name: TI_2_1_2_6_User_Access__Successful__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.6 User Access (Successful) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user access (successful).
purpose: Capture user access (successful), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when user access is successful.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.6#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
